price: 104. Moïse dit : « Ô Pharaon ! Je suis un Messager du Seigneur de l’Univers.
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَٰفِرۡعَوۡنُ إِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā yāfir'ʿawnu innī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
